this_title: Brandy Hellville & the Cult of Fast Fashion
trans_title: BM地狱和快时尚的畸形崇拜
introduction: Fashion is identity for teenage girls and one brand, Brandy Melville, has developed a cult-like following despite its controversial “one size fits all” tagline. Hiding behind its shiny Instagram façade is a shockingly toxic world, a reflection of the global fast fashion industry. Fast fashion isn’t all glitz and glamor – it’s a business that sacrifices humanity and pollutes the planet for the sake of profit. Media stories have exposed some of Brandy Melville’s unsavory practices and that’s why some call it Brandy Hell-Ville.源自：https://schedule.sxsw.com/2024/films/2198565
chinese_title: BM地狱和快时尚的畸形崇拜
foreign_title: Brandy Hellville & the Cult of Fast Fashion
